general.gigTitle: develop wordpress membership website, lms, elearning, online course website

sellerCard.oneLiner: Professional Wix, WordPress, Webflow Website Designer and Developer
sellerCard.description: Hi, I am an expert and highly experienced web designer. I have been creating websites for over 5 years, so I know all the intricacies of website design from domain registration to customization in Shopify, Wix, WordPress, Webflow, Squarespace, GoDaddy, and other CMS platforms. I can design your website from scratch or redesign the existing one to acceptable modern standards. I can create a custom website to your liking, and make changes based on your requirements. I'll optimize your online store for mobile and desktop to make an impact online.

description.content:
Are you looking to create an effective and engaging eLearning platform?


Want to set up an online learning system, develop an online course or membership site, and design/ redesign your current LMS website?


You are on the right page!


As a professional WordPress developer with vast experience in WordPress membership and online course websites, I can design and develop eLearning Management Systems (LMS)with different platforms like learndash, learnpress, and BuddyBoss.


I can assist you in turning your idea for your business into a website that works well. The site will be easy to use, and you'll find it simple to edit and manage.


What I Offer:


  • Complete Online Course Site Creation from Scratch
  • Create a Membership Community Website
  • WordPress LMS Plugin installation
  • Redesign or Upgrade Existing websites
  • Courses, Lessons, and Topics Setup
  • Sell Courses Online in PDF and Videos
  • Integrated Third-party Apps
  • Create Membership Levels
  • Payment Integration
  • Live Chat
  • Bug Fixes


Why Me?


  • Highly Experienced
  • Excellent Communication
  • 24/7 Available
  • Ongoing Support


Take a smart step. Just place an order to get premium services.

slide.name: develop wordpress membership website, lms, elearning, online course website

questionsAndAnswers.question: Can you train me how to modify the website once is it completed?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, I can make customized training videos/word tutorials for you on how to take complete control of your site. Price? Which is 100% free of cost.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Can you create or customize or clone a website as per my requirements?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, I can make and modify or clone any WordPress website. Please contact me in the inbox.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Will I get a responsive website?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, your website will be fully responsive which means it will look professional & user-friendly on any device (smartphone, tablet, laptop).

packageList.title: Create eLearning Website LMS
packageList.description: WordPress Installation | Learndash Plugin Installation 1 Landing Page + Add 2 Courses

packageList.description: LMS Plugin Configuration | Payment Method Integration | 6 Course Creation

packageList.description: Advanced Functionality | Woocommerce Configuration | Membership Sites | 10 Courses
